name: KingdomSavior
description:
The kingdom is under siege! Monsters from the other side of Demon's gate is flooding this kingdom.

You, the hero, must recruit warriors and fight against monster, to collect crystals sealing the Demon's gate.

=================================================

The more warriors you recruit, the harder you maneuvre. The more days you take, the stronger the monsters become. 

Act swiftly and take down the enemies.
